description: Gitcoin, an innovative platform, addresses funding challenges in open-source development through models like quadratic funding, promoting sustainability in the tech industry. By supporting projects focused on energy efficiency and utilizing Proof of Stake systems, Gitcoin aids environmental efforts. It provides global developers opportunities in projects for social good, stressing community building and inclusion for a sustainable future.
keywords: Gitcoin, quadratic funding, sustainability, open-source development, blockchain, Proof of Stake, environmental sustainability, energy efficiency, social equity, community building
title: Gitcoin: Pioneering Sustainability and Equity in Open-Source Development
